name: Gemology (itch) (Crazypirate)
description:
Hello,

This is my submission to the 3 hour game jam. With my knowledge of game design and pixel art that is whati am able to create in 3 hours. To fuel the furnace you need to put 1 coal in it, after that you can put an ore into your liking. My further ideas for this game as following:

- A inventory system so you can keep the bars.

- A anvil so you can make armor, trinkets and weapons out of the bar.

- Upgrades.

Hope you like it!
